mapper.select: SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY notice_no DESC) AS row_num , n.notice_no , n.member_no , n.title , n.content , n.create_date , m.email , nt.type_no , nt.description FROM admin_notice n LEFT JOIN mem_member m ON n.member_no = m.member_no JOIN admin_notice_type nt ON n.type_no = nt.type_no

SELECT n.notice_no , n.member_no , n.title , n.content , n.create_date , m.email , nt.type_no , nt.description FROM admin_notice n LEFT JOIN mem_member m ON n.member_no = m.member_no JOIN admin_notice_type nt ON n.type_no = nt.type_no WHERE n.notice_no = #{ noticeNo }
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM admin_notice WHERE notice_no = #{ noticeNo }
